definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: ] kind, species (NH id. (Sir 43:25 id.), also schismatic, heretic; Jewish-Aram. [[מִינׇא]], species, so Syr. (Edessa) miyno0; Palest. Syr. = nation PS:2094 Schwally:Idioticon 50; yet not Aram. loan-wd. in Heb.; v. Lag:BN 183 f.);—alw. sf. + prep. [[לְמִינֵהוּ]] Ge 1:12, Ge 1:12 + 2 t.; [[לְמִינוֹ]] Ge 1:11 (om. LXX) + 3 t.; [[לְמִינׇהּ]] Ge 1:24, Ge 1:24 + 9 t.; [[לְמִינׇהַ]] Ez Eze 47:10 (del. Co); [[לְמִינֵהֶם]] Ge 1:21; —kind, species, of plant Ge 1:11, Ge 1:12, Ge 1:12; usu. of animal (beast, bird, fish, insect) Ge 1:21, Ge 1:22, Ge 1:24, Ge 1:24, Ge 1:25, Ge 1:25, Ge 1:25, Ge 6:20, Ge 6:20, Ge 6:20, Ge 7:14, Ge 7:14, Ge 7:14, Ge 7:14, Le 11:14, Le 11:15, Le 11:16, Le 11:19, Le 11:22, Le 11:22, Le 11:22, Le 11:22, Le 11:29 (all P); also De 14:13, De 14:14, De 14:15, De 14:18 (cf. Lv) Ez Eze 47:10 (on text, cf. Co).
